short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert text written in one alphabet to another alphabet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Useful when studying foreign languages with a different writing system or dealing with text written in translit.

Usage:
- Left click on the extension button then select some text on the page to apply the mapping.
- Right click on the extension button and select "Options" to see/configure the mapping.

*It is possible to configure mappings for words instead of letters if you want to learn some new words for example.
